mapper.select: select id, user_id, value_id, type, add_time, update_time, deleted from cskaoyan_mall_collect where user_id = #{uid} and value_id = #{gid} and type = #{type} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into cskaoyan_mall_collect (id, user_id, value_id, type, add_time, update_time, deleted) VALUES (null, #{uid}, #{gid}, #{type}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.update: update cskaoyan_mall_collect set deleted = 1 where user_id = #{uid} and value_id = #{gid} and type = #{type} and deleted = 0
mapper.select: select cmc.id as id, cmc.type as type, cmc.value_id as valueId, cmg.brief as brief, cmg.name as name, cmg.pic_url as picUrl, cmg.retail_price as retailPrice from cskaoyan_mall_collect cmc left outer join cskaoyan_mall_goods cmg on cmc.value_id = cmg.id where cmc.user_id = #{uid} and cmc.type = #{type} and cmc.deleted = 0 and cmg.deleted = 0
